content.webTitle: World Cup Football Daily: Germany crowned champions of the world

fields.headline: World Cup Football Daily: Germany crowned champions of the world
fields.bodyText: And, lo, the Germans did it and beat Argentina to win the 2014 World Cup (which took place in Brazil, just in case you forgot). On tonight's final World Cup Football Daily, we've got AC Jimbo, James Horncastle and Scott Murray in the studio, Rafa Honigstein and Jonathan Wilson in Rio and Archie Rhind-Tutt in Munich to discuss every aspect of the final and plenty more besides. And that, as they say, humanoids, is it. Thanks for listening to us whitter on for the last month. We'll see you again in August.
